sql.query:
INSERT INTO api_response
(user_id, recharge_mobile, operator, amount, status, order_id, apirefid, remarks, blank1, blank2) VALUES (:P1 /* {{$_POST.Reatilerid}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.MerchantID}} */, :P3 /* {{$_POST.Service}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.Amount}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.Status}} */, :P6 /* {{$_POST.TxnID}} */, :P7 /* {{$_POST.RRN}} */, :P8 /* {{$_POST.Description}} */, :P9 /* {{$_POST.BankName}} */, :P10 /* {{$_POST.TxnDate}} */)

SELECT id, user_fname, user_mobile, user_type, md_id, ds_id, scheme_id, aeps_balance
FROM m_users
WHERE user_id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.Reatilerid}} */

select mo.service_id, mc.operator_id, mc.comm_per, mc.comm_val, mc.service_charge_per, mc.service_charge_val, mo.operator_name 
from m_commission mc
left join m_operator mo on (mo.id=mc.operator_id)
left join m_service ms on (ms.id=mo.service_id)
where mc.scheme_id = @scheme_id and mo.min_amount::int <= @amount and mo.max_amount::int >=@amount and 
(mo.id=203 or mo.id=202 or mo.id=198)and ms.service_name ='AEPS';

SELECT id AS admin_id, user_id AS admin_user_id, user_fname AS admin_name, user_mobile AS admin_mobile, user_email AS admin_email, aeps_balance AS admin_aeps_balance
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type = 0

SELECT id AS dt_id, user_fname AS dt_name, user_mobile AS dt_mobile, user_type AS dt_user_type, scheme_id AS dt_scheme_id, aeps_balance AS dt_aeps_balance
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.ds_id}} */

SELECT comm_per AS dt_comm_per, comm_val AS dt_comm_val, service_charge_per AS dt_charge_per, service_charge_val AS dt_charge_val
FROM m_commission
WHERE operator_id = :P1 /* {{GetCommision[0].operator_id}} */ AND scheme_id = :P2 /* {{GetRTCreator.dt_scheme_id}} */

SELECT id AS mdt_id, user_fname AS mdt_name, user_mobile AS mdt_mobile, scheme_id AS mdt_scheme_id, aeps_balance AS mdt_aeps_bal, user_type AS mdt_user_type
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.md_id}} */

SELECT comm_per AS mdt_comm_per, comm_val AS mdt_comm_val, service_charge_per AS mdt_charge_per, service_charge_val AS mdt_charge_val
FROM m_commission
WHERE operator_id = :P1 /* {{GetCommision[0].operator_id}} */ AND scheme_id = :P2 /* {{GetDTCreator.mdt_scheme_id}} */

values.value: {{$_POST.Service+' of Rs. '+$_POST.Amount+' by RT Id:'+$_POST.RRN+' | Merchant Id: '+$_POST.MerchantID+' | Txn. Id:'+$_POST.TxnID}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO tt_aeps_trans
(service_id, op_id, api_id, user_id, user_rt_id, merchant_id, amount, op_bal, comm_per, comm_val, comm_amt, charge_per, charge_val, charge_amt, net_amt, closing_bal, tr_mode, tr_type, status, tr_id, reason, api_logs, is_processed, operator_ref, api_ref, revert_trans, ip_address, api_response_time, process_mode, live, tr_date, trans_by, ec, dt_comm_per, dt_comm_val, dt_comm_amt, dt_charge_per, dt_charge_val, dt_charge_amount, mdt_comm_per, mdt_comm_val, mdt_comm_amt, mdt_charge_per, mdt_charge_val, mdt_charge_amt, bank_name, service_api, api_tnx_date, aeps_number) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetCommision[0].service_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetCommision[0].operator_id}} */, :P3 /* {{0}} */, :P4 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.Reatilerid}} */, :P6 /* {{$_POST.MerchantID}} */, :P7 /* {{$_POST.Amount}} */, :P8 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.aeps_balance}} */, :P9 /* {{GetCommision[0].comm_per}} */, :P10 /* {{GetCommision[0].comm_val}} */, :P11 /* {{RTCommAmt}} */, :P12 /* {{GetCommision[0].service_charge_per}} */, :P13 /* {{GetCommision[0].service_charge_val}} */, :P14 /* {{RTChargeAmt}} */, :P15 /* {{RTNetAmt}} */, :P16 /* {{RTClosingBalance}} */, :P17 /* {{'Web'}} */, :P18 /* {{'Cash'}} */, :P19 /* {{'Pending'}} */, :P20 /* {{$_POST.TxnID}} */, :P21 /* {{$_POST.Service+' of Rs. '+$_POST.Amount+' by RT Id:'+$_POST.RRN+' | Merchant Id: '+$_POST.MerchantID+' | Txn. Id:'+$_POST.TxnID}} */, :P22 /* {{'AEEP'}} */, :P23 /* {{$_POST.TxnID}} */, :P24 /* {{$_POST.Description}} */, :P25 /* {{$_POST.RRN}} */, '0', :P26 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P27 /* {{apiResponseTime}} */, :P28 /* {{'A2C'}} */, :P29 /* {{'Live'}} */, :P30 /* {{NOW}} */, :P31 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */, :P32 /* {{$_POST.Status}} */, :P33 /* {{DTCommPer}} */, :P34 /* {{DTCommVal}} */, :P35 /* {{DTCommAmt}} */, :P36 /* {{DTChargePer}} */, :P37 /* {{DTChargeVal}} */, :P38 /* {{DTChargeAmt}} */, :P39 /* {{MDTCommPer}} */, :P40 /* {{MDTCommVal}} */, :P41 /* {{MDTCommAmt}} */, :P42 /* {{MDTChargePer}} */, :P43 /* {{MDTChargeVal}} */, :P44 /* {{MDTChargeAmt}} */, :P45 /* {{$_POST.BankName}} */, :P46 /* {{$_POST.Service}} */, :P47 /* {{$_POST.TxnDate}} */, :P48 /* {{$_POST.MerchantID}} */)

params.name: :P21
params.value: {{$_POST.Service+' of Rs. '+$_POST.Amount+' by RT Id:'+$_POST.RRN+' | Merchant Id: '+$_POST.MerchantID+' | Txn. Id:'+$_POST.TxnID}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO tt_aeps_balance
(user_id, pay_ref_id, crdr_type, old_bal, amount, net_amt, new_bal, status, tr_type, tr_date, ip_address, remarks, created_by) VALUES (:P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */, :P2 /* {{AEPSRechTrans.identity}} */, :P3 /* {{'Credit'}} */, :P4 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.aeps_balance}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.Amount}} */, :P6 /* {{RTNetAmt}} */, :P7 /* {{RTClosingBalance}} */, :P8 /* {{'FAILED'}} */, :P9 /* {{$_POST.Service}} */, :P10 /* {{NOW}} */, :P11 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P12 /* {{$_POST.Service+' | '+$_POST.Amount+' | '+$_POST.TxnDate+' | '+$_POST.RRN+' | '+$_POST.Reatilerid}} */, :P13 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */)

UPDATE m_users
SET aeps_balance = :P1 /* {{NewRTBal}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */

UPDATE tt_aeps_trans
SET status = :P1 /* {{Status}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{AEPSRechTrans.identity}} */

UPDATE tt_aeps_balance
SET status = :P1 /* {{Status}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{AddAEPSBal.identity}} */

values.value: {{'Merchant Id: '+$_POST.MerchantID+' | Txn. Ref. Id: '+$_POST.TxnID+' | Amt. '+$_POST.Amount+' | Id: '+AEPSRechTrans.identity+' | Net Charge Amt.: '+AdminChargeNetAmt}}

(user_id, pay_ref_id, crdr_type, old_bal, amount, net_amt, new_bal, tr_type, tr_date, ip_address, remarks, created_by) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetAdmin.admin_id}} */, :P2 /* {{AEPSRechTrans.identity}} */, :P3 /* {{'Credit'}} */, :P4 /* {{GetAdmin.admin_aeps_balance}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.Amount}} */, :P6 /* {{AdminChargeNetAmt}} */, :P7 /* {{AdminClosingBalance}} */, :P8 /* {{'AEPS Charge'}} */, :P9 /* {{NOW}} */, :P10 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P11 /* {{'Merchant Id: '+$_POST.MerchantID+' | Txn. Ref. Id: '+$_POST.TxnID+' | Amt. '+$_POST.Amount+' | Id: '+AEPSRechTrans.identity+' | Net Charge Amt.: '+AdminChargeNetAmt}} */, :P12 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */)

UPDATE m_users
SET aeps_balance = :P1 /* {{MDTClosingBalance}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.md_id}} */

UPDATE tt_aeps_trans
SET status = :P1 /* {{Status}} */, op_bal = :P2 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.aeps_balance}} */
WHERE id = :P3 /* {{AEPSRechTrans.identity}} */

UPDATE tt_aeps_balance
SET status = :P1 /* {{Status}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{AddAEPSBal.identity}} */

INSERT INTO tt_aeps_balance
(user_id, pay_ref_id, crdr_type, old_bal, amount, net_amt, new_bal, status, tr_type, tr_date, ip_address, remarks, created_by) VALUES (:P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */, :P2 /* {{AEPSRechTrans.identity}} */, :P3 /* {{'Debit'}} */, :P4 /* {{RTClosingBalance}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.Amount}} */, :P6 /* {{RTNetAmt}} */, :P7 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.aeps_balance}} */, :P8 /* {{'REFUND'}} */, :P9 /* {{$_POST.Service}} */, :P10 /* {{NOW}} */, :P11 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P12 /* {{$_POST.Service+' | '+$_POST.Amount+' | '+$_POST.TxnDate+' | '+$_POST.RRN+' | '+$_POST.Reatilerid}} */, :P13 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */)
